# Martin Luther King Jr. Promenade

| area           =
| created        = 1992
| operator       =
| visitation_num =
| status         =
| designation    =
| open           =
}}
Martin Luther King Jr. Promenade is a  linear park and memorial promenade in San Diego, California. Children's Park lies within the promenade. The promenade was dedicated in 1992.

* List of parks in San Diego
